column2: truly wanted to love this place. I know it's probably our own fault for not making a reservation
column3: but we ended up waiting over an hour to get a table
column4: which is less than ideal after a night of drinking. When we finally were seated
column5: we were left to sit at the table for another 20 minutes without water while the servers presumably were allowing us to decide what to order despite our extended wait. When we finally did have our order taken
column6: they were out of three of the meals we wanted
column7: so we had to resort to quick picks at the server's suggestions.
